title: 3D Artist
description: Creates three-dimensional models, animations, and visual effects to be used in various digital media.

title: 3D Modeler
description: Specializes in building 3D characters, environments, and objects based on concept art.
responsibilities: sculpt and model characters and props
Ensure topology is suitable for animation

title: Accessibility Lead
description: Leads efforts to ensure products and services are accessible to users of all abilities.
responsibilities: Train teams on accessible design principles

title: Accessibility Specialist
description: Focuses on testing and implementing accessibility standards within digital products.

title: Accessibility Strategist
description: Develops long-term strategies to integrate accessibility into organizational processes.

title: AI Designer
description: Designs user experiences and interactions specifically for artificial intelligence systems.

title: AI Prompt Designer
description: Crafts and optimizes prompts to generate desired outputs from generative AI models.

title: AI Prototyping Designer
description: Rapidly prototypes concepts using AI tools to validate ideas and workflows.
responsibilities: Build functional prototypes with AI APIs

title: Apparel Designer
description: Designs clothing and accessories considering style, material, and production.

title: AR Designer
description: Creates augmented reality experiences that overlay digital content onto the real world.

title: Art Director
description: Responsible for the visual style and images in magazines, newspapers, product packaging, and movie and television productions.
responsibilities: Determine how to best represent a concept visually
Determine which photographs, art, or other design elements to use
Develop the overall look or style of a publication, an advertising campaign, or a theater, television, or film set

title: Behavioural Designer
description: Applies psychology and behavioral economics to design products that influence user behavior.

title: Brand Designer
description: Creates the visual identity and guidelines for brands to ensure consistency.

title: Business Designer
description: Applies design methodologies to business models and strategy.
responsibilities: Bridge gap between design and business

title: Character Designer
description: Visualizes and designs characters for games, animation, and media.

title: Chief Design Officer (CDO)
description: Executive responsible for overseeing all design and innovation aspects of an organization.
responsibilities: Champion design culture in the C-suite

title: Chief Digital Officer (CDO)
description: Executive driving digital transformation and the adoption of digital technologies.

title: Chief Experience Officer (CXO)
description: Executive responsible for the overall customer experience across all touchpoints.

title: Chief Innovation Officer (CIO)
description: Executive in charge of managing the process of innovation and change management.

title: Chief Marketing Officer (CMO)
description: Executive responsible for marketing activities and brand management.

title: Circular Designer
description: Designs products and systems with a focus on sustainability and the circular economy.

title: CMF Designer
description: Specializes in Color, Material, and Finish design for physical products.

title: Communications Designer
description: Focuses on expressing messages effectively through visual and textual content.

title: Concept Designer
description: Visualizes initial ideas for characters, environments, or products.

title: Concept Development Manager
description: Manages the early stages of product or service development.

title: Content Designer
description: Designs content strategies and creates clear, user-focused content.

title: Content Manager
description: Oversees the creating, editing, and publishing of content.

title: Context Designer
description: Designs for the situational context in which a product or service is used.

title: Conversation Designer
description: Designs the flow and logic of conversations for chatbots and voice assistants.

title: Creative Team Manager
description: Manages a team of creative professionals and oversees project delivery.

title: Creative Technologist
description: Combines creative design skills with technical coding ability to prototype ideas.

title: CX Architect
description: Structures the overall customer experience ecosystem and touchpoints.

title: CX Designer
description: Designs holistic customer experiences across multiple channels.

title: CX Lead
description: Leads CX initiatives and guides teams to deliver superior customer experiences.

title: CX Specialist

title: Data Visualization Designer

title: Design Coach

title: Design Director
description: Senior leader responsible for the quality and direction of design output.

title: Design Educator

title: Design Engineer

title: Design Lead
description: Leads the design execution for a specific product or project.

title: Design Leader
description: A general leadership role focused on guiding design strategy and culture.

title: Design Manager

title: Design Operations Lead

title: Design Researcher

title: Design Strategist

title: Design System Designer

title: Design Technologist

title: Designer

title: Game Designer

responsibilities: Develop graphics for product illustrations, logos, and websites
Select colors, images, text style, and layout
